# include<iostream>
#  include <cmath>

using namespace std;
int checkpalin(long long int num)
{
   long long int t=num;
   long long int rev=0;
   int r;
   while(t!=0)
  {
     r=t%10;
     rev=rev*10+r;
     t=t/10;
  }
   if(rev==num)
  {
    return 1;
  }
  else
  {
   return 0;
  }
}

int checkprime(long long  int num)
{
    if(num%2==0 && num!=2)
   {
      return 0;
   }
   else if(num==2)
   {
      return 1;
   }
   else
  {
    for(long long int i=3;i<=sqrt(num);i=i+2)
    {
        if(num%i==0)
        return 0;
    }
  }
    return 1;
}
int main()
{
    long long int n,i,j, k,l=0;
    cin>>n;
    if(n==1 || n==2)
    cout<<2;
    else if(n==3)
    cout<<3;
  else
 {
    l=n/6;
    if(n%6==0)
    l=l-1;
    l++;
    //cout<<l<<endl;
    while((6*l+1)<=10000000 && (6*l-1)<=10000000)
   {
        //cout<<6*l-1 <<" " <<6*l+1<<endl;

        if( checkpalin(6*l-1)==1 && checkprime(6*l-1)==1 && (6*l-1)>=n)
       {
         cout<<(6*l-1);
         break;
       }
        else if( checkpalin(6*l+1)==1 && checkprime(6*l+1)==1 && (6*l+1)>=n )
       {
         cout<<(6*l+1);
         break;
       }
       else
       l++;
   }
 }
return 0;
}
